content:
Pan heralds are the religious figures of the swarm, these satyrs empower surrounding units using their speech of salvation, they drive their allies to fight with all their might and give their best for the cause of the swarm.
    And though not suited for combat, they are also trained in the arts of spearmanship like all satyrs, meaning they can also fight alongside their allies in the frontline.
author: Seth
title: Pan Heralds
